description: Developing this portfolio was my first time working on a web-app project. The process of learning the technologies that went into this project was highly enjoyable, leaving me feeling like the domain of my potential as a developer has expanded ten fold. I look forward to utilizing React and related technologies to make more interesting applications in the future

The focus of this project was to get comfortable with API's. I chose the Spotify API becuase I am listening to music whenever it is appropriate to do so, and someones even when it's not. To complete this project I learnt about standard API call practices and presenting the data from a JSON in a structured format
